args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Analysis: Parsing the latest Pete Hegseth allegation President Donald Trump’s defense secretary nominee, Pete Hegseth, in his Senate confirmation hearing last week dismissed a series of allegations against him as “anonymous smears.” But not all of them have been anonymous. And now, for the second time, Hegseth has been accused of abusive behavior toward women by a woman named Hegseth. Read the full story
